===Etymology===
Built in 723, the Huaqing pools was a hot springs in Huaqing Palace (華清宮), which was located atop Mount Li (驪山) in the [[w:Qinling Mountains|Qinling Mountains]]. It was located approximately 25 km to the east of the capitol city of [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]]
